attributes.action: Take whatever steps are necessary to get rid of the current Speaker who is a disgrace to the honour of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current speaker acts as a shop-steward for MPs rather than uphohlding the highest standards of the House of Commons.  He must go, and go as soon as possible.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
